Detailed Description

Graph-specific declarations.

Author:
Ignacy Gawedzki
Date:
Thu Sep 25 20:54:36 2003
The graph is defined as an adjacency hash table. The graph per se is a hash table of nodes and a hash table of arcs. An additional hash map is used to find the subset of arcs connecting a given node in either direction.
